feedback.text: the "test" checklist that claude generates after fixing an issues is SUPER comprehensive. this is a little annoying for vibe coding. instead, just make a compact summary of the fixes/features implemented, and make claude run the app locally so that you can test that everything works

add icons to each project! the user should be able to select an image icon to use, and it should be stored inside the .vibe folder. should be applied in the left sidebar in the circle instead of the letter (if the project has an icon, otherwise just do the letter). icons are not mandatory.
